73 // Copyright (c) 2002-2003 GBDI-ICMC-USP
74 #ifndef __STFASTMAPPER_H
75 #define __STFASTMAPPER_H
76 
77 
78 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
79 // Simple euclidean distance
80 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
91 template <class T> T Euclidean2(const T * a, const T * b, int n){
92  int i;
93  T tmp;
94  T d;
95 
96  d = 0;
97  for (i = 0; i < n; i++){
98  tmp = a[i] - b[i];
99  d += tmp * tmp;
100  }//end for
101 
102  return d;
103 }//end Eucliden2
104 
105 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
106 // Class stFastMapImage
107 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
126 template <class ObjectType>
127 class stFastMapImage{
128  public:
137  stFastMapImage(ObjectType * object, int dim, bool ownership = false){
138 
139  // Initialize
140  Object = object;
141  Mine = ownership;
142  Dim = dim;
143  Coords = new double[dim];
144  }//end stFastMapImage
145 
150  virtual ~stFastMapImage(){
151 
152  if (Coords != NULL){
153  delete[] Coords;
154  }//end if
155 
156  if ((Object != NULL) && (Mine)){
157  delete Object;
158  }//end if
159  }//end ~stFastMapImage
160 
164  const ObjectType * GetObject(){
165  return Object;
166  }//end GetObject
167 
175  void SetObject(ObjectType * obj, bool ownership = false){
176 
177  if ((Object != NULL) && (Mine)){
178  delete Object;
179  }//end if
180 
181  Object = obj;
182  Mine = ownership;
183  }//end GetObject
184 
188  double & operator [] (int idx){
189  return Coords[idx];
190  }//end operator []
191 
198  void GetCoords(double * coords){
199  memcpy(coords, Coords, sizeof(double) * Dim);
200  }//end GetCoords
201 
206  const double * GetCoords(){
207  return Coords;
208  }//end GetCoords
209 
215  void SetCoords(const double * coords){
216  memcpy(Coords, coords, sizeof(double) * Dim);
217  }//end GetCoords
218 
224  void SetCoordsTo(double value = 0);
225 
229  int GetDimension(){
230  return Dim;
231  }//end GetDimension
232 
236  stFastMapImage * Clone(){
237  stFastMapImage * c;
238 
239  c = new stFastMapImage(Object->Clone(), Dim, true);
240  c->SetCoords(Coords);
241  return c;
242  }//end Clone
243  private:
247  int Dim;
248 
252  double * Coords;
253 
257  ObjectType * Object;
258 
262  bool Mine;
263 };//end stFastMapImage

265 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
266 // stFastMapper
267 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
318 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
319 class stFastMapper{
320  public:
331  stFastMapper(EvaluatorType * eval, int dim = 3, int dLoopCount = 5){
332  // Initialize
333  Eval = eval;
334  Dim = dim;
335  DLoopCount = dLoopCount;
336 
337  // Make room for pivots
338  PivotDist = new double[Dim];
339  PivotDist2 = new double[Dim];
340  Pivots = new stFastMapImage<ObjectType> * [Dim * 2];
341  memset(Pivots, 0, sizeof(stFastMapImage<ObjectType> *) * Dim * 2);
342  }//end stFastMapper
343 
347  ~stFastMapper();
348 
357  void Map(ObjectType * obj, double * map);
358 
362  int GetDimensions(){
363  return Dim;
364  }//end GetDimensions
365 
391  void ChoosePivots(ObjectType ** objs, int n,
392  double * maps = NULL, int * pivotids = NULL);
393 
401  int GetPivotIdx(int axis, int name){
402  return (axis * 2) + name;
403  }//end GetPivotIdx
404 
412  const ObjectType * GetPivotObject(int idx){
413  if (Pivots[idx] != NULL){
414  return Pivots[idx]->GetObject();
415  }else{
416  return NULL;
417  }//end if
418  }//end GetPivotObject
419 
430  void GetPivotMap(int idx, double * map){
431  if (Pivots[idx] != NULL){
432  Pivots[idx]->GetCoords(map);
433  }//end if
434  }//end GetPivotMap
435 
454  void SetPivot(int idx, const ObjectType * obj, const double * map){
455 
456  // Create image if required.
457  if (Pivots[idx] == NULL){
458  Pivots[idx] = new stFastMapImage<ObjectType>(((ObjectType *)obj)->Clone(), Dim);
459  }else{
460  Pivots[idx]->SetObject(((ObjectType *)obj)->Clone());
461  }//end if
462 
463  // Replace image contents
464  if (map != NULL){
465  Pivots[idx]->SetCoords(map);
466  }//end if
467  }//end SetPivot
468 
475  void UpdatePivotMaps();
476 
488  double GetStress(int n, const ObjectType ** objs, const double ** maps);
489 
497  bool IsReady(){
498  return (Pivots[(Dim * 2) - 1] != NULL);
499  }//end IsReady
500  private:
504  int Dim;
505 
509  int DLoopCount;
510 
514  EvaluatorType * Eval;
515 
519  stFastMapImage<ObjectType> ** Pivots;
520 
524  double * PivotDist;
525 
529  double * PivotDist2;
530 
538  stFastMapImage<ObjectType> ** CreateTmpImageVector(ObjectType ** objs, int n);
539 
546  void DisposeImageVector(stFastMapImage<ObjectType> ** vec, int n);
547 
555  void GetImageMaps(stFastMapImage<ObjectType> ** imgs, int n, double * maps);
556 
567  void FindPivots(stFastMapImage<ObjectType> ** imgs, int n, int axis, int & pa, int & pb,
568  double & dist);
569 
577  double Project(const ObjectType * obj, const double * map, int axis);
578 
591  double GetFMDistance2(const ObjectType * o1, const double * map1,
592  const ObjectType * o2, const double * map2, int axis){
593 
594  return Eval->GetDistance2((ObjectType *) o1, (ObjectType *)o2)
595  - Euclidean2(map1, map2, axis);
596  }//end GetFMDistance2
597 };//end stFastMapper
